summary: The Go Pack Go Act of 2025 amends the Communications Act of 1934 and Title 17 of the United States Code to increase access to in-state television broadcast programming for cable and satellite subscribers in certain Wisconsin counties (Ashland, Barron, Bayfield, Burnett, Douglas, Dunn, Florence, Iron, Pierce, Polk, Sawyer, St. Croix, and Washburn). It allows subscribers to choose between local network stations or in-state, adjacent-market network stations, impacting retransmission consent and copyright licensing. The bill also defines covered counties and in-State, adjacent-market network station retransmission.
